name: 2D to CAD Conversion
info: Converting hand-drawn sketches, blueprints, or PDF files into accurate CAD drawings.

name: Space Planning
info: Optimizing the layout of spaces based on the 2D floor plans to improve functionality and flow.

name: 3D Modeling from 2D Plans:
info: Creating detailed 3D models from 2D floor plans using software like Revit, AutoCAD, or SketchUp.
